    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113485</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Controlling blood glucose levels by glucagon and insulin secretions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Steuernblutglukosestufen durch Glucagon- und 
Insulinabsonderungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Niveaux de contrôle de glucose de sang par des 
sécrétions de glucagon et d'insuline</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Níveis controlando do glucose do sangue por 
secretions do glucagon e do insulin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Livelli gestenti del glucosio di anima dalle 
secrezioni dell'insulina e del glucagon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελέγχοντας επίπεδα γλυκόζης αίματος από glucagon 
και ινσουλίνης τις εκκρίσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Niveles de la glucosa de la sangre que controlan 
por secreciones del glucagon y de la insulina</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the functions of glucagon and insulin secreted by alpha and beta cells respectively in controlling glucose levels in the blood.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alpha cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beta cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Effectors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glucagon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glucose levels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">insulin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">islets of Langerhans</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sensors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Stimuli</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Funktionen des
Glucagon und des Insulins, die durch Alpha abgesondert werden und die 
Betazellen beziehungsweise in steuernglukosestufen im Blut.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre les fonctions du glucagon 
et de l'insuline sécrétés par l'alpha et de bêtas cellules 
respectivement dans les niveaux de contrôle de glucose dans le sang.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra as funções do glucagon e 
do insulin secreted pelo alfa e pilhas beta respectivamente em níveis
controlando do glucose no sangue.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra le funzioni di glucagon e 
di insulina secernuti dall'alfa e le beta cellule rispettivamente nei 
livelli gestenti del glucosio nell'anima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τις λειτουργίες glucagon
και της ινσουλίνης που εκκρίνονται από τα άλφα και βήτα κύτταρα 
αντίστοιχα στον έλεγχο των επιπέδων γλυκόζης στο αίμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra las funciones del glucagon 
y de la insulina secretados por la alfa y las células beta 
respectivamente en niveles de la glucosa que controlan en la sangre.</string>
          </description>
